short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disney+ is the streaming home of your favorite stories..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With thousands of hours of entertainment from Disney, there's always something to explore. Stream the latest movie releases, exclusive Original series, and a catalog of classics with more stories added every week.

"Watch via Disney+" is a convenient Chrome extension that allows you to seamlessly watch movies on D+ directly from any image you find online. Simply right-click on any image, select "Watch via D+", and the extension will automatically search for the related content on D+ and open it in a new tab.

Key Features:

Quick Access: Right-click on any image and instantly search for related content

Seamless Integration: Easily connects with your account, enhancing your browsing experience.

Enhance your Disney+ experience with the "Watch via Disney+" Chrome extension and make discovering content easier than ever!


























this is not an official disneyplus extension
This is a premium version available for $19.99. 1day trial version
